version_description: Minor bug fixes

We have listened to your feedback and added more functions for your convenience.
Here are some of the features you can enjoy when you upgrade the app:
-Snapshot : Activating Citi Mobile Snapshot will let you check your balance and 5 most recent transactions for the below account. For other accounts please sign-in .
oChecking Accounts
oSaving and investments
oCredit cards
oLoans
-Card activation : facilitate you to activate/deactivate your Credit card and Citi card instantly.
-ATM PIN reset : facilitate you to reset your ATM PIN.
-Time deposit : facilitate you to open and view your time-deposit account
-FX rate inquiry : facilitate you to view foreign exchange rate.
-Real-time transactions : Credit Card transactions that have been authorized but not yet settled to your account will appear as pending

We have listened to your feedback and added more functions for your convenience.
Here are some of the features you can enjoy when you upgrade the app:
-Touch ID: customers using iPhone featuring this function can sign in to the Citi Mobile using their fingerprint making everyday banking simpler and faster. Please find more details of this feature on the application setting.
- Jailbroken/Rooted Device detection: This enhancement will allow Citi Mobile to detect jailbroken or rooted devices for iOS & android. Jailbroken or rooted mobile device may expose to vulnerabilities and less security. You are strongly advised to use Citi Mobile on secure mobile devices.

We've been hard at work to bring improvements to our app. This update includes important performance and compatibility fixes and allows you to request for Citi PayLite on your eligible pending transactions easier than ever.
The update contains bug fixes and improvements for performance and security.

We've been hard at work to bring improvements to our app. Updates include:
▪ Scan & Pay using PromptPay QR Code, where you can easily pay for your goods and services by simply scanning merchant's PromptPay QR Code and pay directly from your savings account- providing you fuss-free, cashless environment
▪ Quick Cash on Ready Credit, where you can get an instant cash from your Ready Credit easier than ever in a newly designed interface, made to serve you better

Citibank Global Wallet:
Turn on Citibank Global Wallet to spend like a local and shop online globally with your Citibank Debit Mastercard®. Auto-switch up to 9 currencies and avoid FX charges/transaction processing fees upon you spending in foreign currencies or withdrawals at Citi ATMs worldwide.
Enhance your global experience by simply opening new foreign currency account instantly – just in few clicks.
Important compatibility fixes

We’ve started creating new interface for Citi Credit Card services to give you control over your credit card matters, providing you with the simplest yet secure experiences for everything at your glance.
You can now:
- Discover great deals wherever you are with Citi World Privileges
The update contains bug fixes and improvements for performance and security.

What’s new
We’ve added some enhancements to improve your experience as follows:
- Updating your personal information (email address, phone and mailing address) directly by yourself on Citi Mobile App
The update contains bug fixes and improvements for performance and security.

What’s new
We’ve started creating new interface for Citi Credit Card services to give you control over your credit card matters, providing you with the simplest yet secure experiences for everything at your glance.
- Our new feature, Citi Scan & Pay, allows you to easily pay for goods and services by simply scanning QR codes at select merchants. Payment is protected by your secure 6 digit PIN, and you continue to earn Citi Rewards Points on your Citi Credit Card.
The update contains bug fixes and improvements for performance and security.
